scripts.build:devterm: export USE_SYSTEM_FPM=true && node scripts/build-vue.js && electron-builder -c config/electron-builder.js --linux deb --arm64
scripts.generate:icons: npx -p electron-icon-maker -c 'mkdir -p src/main/assets && electron-icon-maker --input=../frontend/assets/img/icons/icon.png --output=build && electron-icon-maker --input=../frontend/assets/img/icons/icon-default.png --output=src/main/assets/icon-default && electron-icon-maker --input=../frontend/assets/img/icons/icon-dark.png --output=src/main/assets/icon-dark && electron-icon-maker --input=../frontend/assets/img/icons/icon-light.png --output=src/main/assets/icon-light && electron-icon-maker --input=../frontend/assets/img/icons/icon-offline-default.png --output=src/main/assets/icon-offline-default && electron-icon-maker --input=../frontend/assets/img/icons/icon-offline-dark.png --output=src/main/assets/icon-offline-dark && electron-icon-maker --input=../frontend/assets/img/icons/icon-offline-light.png --output=src/main/assets/icon-offline-light && electron-icon-maker --input=../frontend/assets/img/icons/icon-online-default.png --output=src/main/assets/icon-online-default &&  electron-icon-maker --input=../frontend/assets/img/icons/icon-online-dark.png --output=src/main/assets/icon-online-dark && electron-icon-maker --input=../frontend/assets/img/icons/icon-online-light.png --output=src/main/assets/icon-online-light && electron-icon-maker --input=../frontend/assets/img/icons/icon-remote-online-default.png --output=src/main/assets/icon-remote-online-default && electron-icon-maker --input=../frontend/assets/img/icons/icon-remote-online-dark.png --output=src/main/assets/icon-remote-online-dark && electron-icon-maker --input=../frontend/assets/img/icons/icon-remote-online-light.png --output=src/main/assets/icon-remote-online-light && electron-icon-maker --input=../frontend/assets/img/icons/icon-server-online-default.png --output=src/main/assets/icon-server-online-default && electron-icon-maker --input=../frontend/assets/img/icons/icon-server-online-dark.png --output=src/main/assets/icon-server-online-dark && electron-icon-maker --input=../frontend/assets/img/icons/icon-server-online-light.png --output=src/main/assets/icon-server-online-light'
